message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I think it would be a great fit for you, and I'm asking for $14,000 to start.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget, but $14,000 is closer to what I had in mind. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $11,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
